argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_unss | |- ( ( A C_ ( _V X. _V ) /\ B C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) <-> ( A u. B ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel A <-> A C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel B <-> B C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_anbi12i | |- ( ( Rel A /\ Rel B ) <-> ( A C_ ( _V X. _V ) /\ B C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel ( A u. B ) <-> ( A u. B ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5 | #P_3bitr4ri | |- ( Rel ( A u. B ) <-> ( Rel A /\ Rel B ) ) |
